title: Workshop on Developing 21st-Century Competencies Using Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital learning tools (smartphone apps, LMS)
context.additional_context: A course verifying the effectiveness of flipped learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting learners adapted to non-face-to-face education post-COVID-19.

learning_goals: Establishing self-directed learning strategies to enhance 21st-century competencies (collaboration, critical thinking, creativity, etc.) by applying the flipped learning model
Assessing knowledge application skills by combining video lectures with LMS-based discussion activities in asynchronous online environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
